name: Spike (ellelaw)
description:
You're Spike, a merdragon swimming through caverns to collect shells that contains lost memories. Why is your memory so fuzzy?

The game should last about ten minutes tops.

Apologies in advance for a couple of known bugs. I created this game two years ago and when I opened it with Unity 2019 (without backing the original version up), it messed up a couple of files :(

- If you pick up the shell floating as a star without viewing the whole "sea giant", the top right instructions will block one of the dialogue boxes.

- At certain angles, Spike's top down controls will result in a very odd swimming pattern.
